IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.update_login_at') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.update_login_at GO
CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.update_login_at @account_id dbo.id_t AS
SET NOCOUNT ON
UPDATE dbo.Accounts SET last_login_at = GETDATE() WHERE id = @account_id
SET NOCOUNT OFF
